title: The Adamantine Palace
description: A "remarkable debut" ( Locus ) from the "new Dragon Lord in town" (Gareth Wilson, Falcata Times).The power of the Realms depends on its dragons. With their terrifying natures, they are ridden by the aristocracy and bred for hunting and war. But as dangerous political maneuverings threaten the complacency of the empire, a single dragon has gone missing. And even that one dragon-returned to its full intelligence and fury-could spell disaster for the Realms...
author: Stephen Deas
